name: Attack on Titan Defense
description:
This is game created on Construct3 Engine.

You can become Survey Corps Soldier who fights against titans that attacked city.
They are so big and hard to kill. Only known way to kill titan is cut back of their neck.
But to do this you need jump into the sky using 3DMG set and make rush into weakspot of Titan

Moving: A, D
Jump (while being on ground): Space;
LMB - Use rope to attach to other object (castle at spawn, gate at end of map, houses roofs, trees, titans);
Space (with LMB pressed) - Thrust mode to make better acceleration;

You have limited gas, so you need to recovery this from your base (at left);
You lose if you are touched by Titan.
